title: RA Sushi serves mochi ice cream dessert
statement: RA Sushi offers Sweet Mochi Trio, a traditional Japanese ice cream dessert wrapped in sweet rice cake with flavors including green tea, chocolate, strawberry, mango and yuzu.

citations.quote: SWEET MOCHI TRIO A traditional Japanese ice cream dessert wrapped in sweet rice cake; your choice of any three flavors: green tea, chocolate, strawberry, mango and yuzu
